item.title: My Journey: From Developer to Entrepeneur and Back Again
item.description:
A New Chapter

If you look at my LinkedIn profile, you might have a few questions. A Master’s in Computer Science from TU Berlin, a job as a Java developer, and then… a sudden shift in 2017 to run an e-commerce company in Indonesia for eight years. It’s not exactly a straight line.

I’m writing this because I’m starting a new chapter. After building a successful business, I’ve realized what I miss most is the craft of building software. So, I’m returning to my roots as a hands-on backend developer, and I plan to document that journey right here.
